course.subject: ENVR
course.name: Catastrophe Risk Management and Global Markets
course.description: This course studies global catastrophe modeling and risk management with focus on China market from non-life insurance and reinsurance perspective. The current development on catastrophe modeling will be covered in-depth using examples from industry experience and applied research. Insurance portfolio management and global insurance regulation will be reviewed. Particular attention is also given to weather risk management with its application in energy supply industry.

reviews.author: yyyyhhhh
reviews.comment_content:
High workload and I feel like I cannot learn anything from it.

Boring to listen to the instructor.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Very Boring! I do not know whether the instructor truly understands what he is talking about.

But the instructor himself is very nice, he is friendly to all the students.

No need to listen to his content and his slides. There is nothing important.
reviews.comment_grading: Bad. I got A- but I think I can at least have A. Many other PG course offers better grading policy, but this course is truly bad.
reviews.comment_workload: Very high: quiz twice a course, report/essay/pre twice a course. Finally, you have to submit a very long essay with your group members.
